protected class StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel
extends TechnicalTestAbstract.ContinuousLineGraphPanelAbstract

GraphPanel controls the graphing of the statistics for this test.

Constructor Detail

StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel

public StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel()
The graph of this test's statistics. By default, the graph number is reset.

StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel

public StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel(StochasticKDTest.Stats stats)
The graph for a specific set of statistics. By default, the graph number is reset.

StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel

public StochasticKDTest.GraphPanel(boolean resetCount)
The graph of this test's statistics. If the resetCount parameter is set to false, then this graph is a subsequent graph and is overlaid on the prior graphs.

Parameters:
resetCount - false indicates a subsequent graph to the first
Method Detail

getGraphPanel

public JPanel getGraphPanel()
Get the graph panel to draw the graph into.

getYBuffer

public double getYBuffer()
Gets the number of pixels that should be added as white space to the top and bottom of the graph when calculating the scale of the graph. This value is inside the graph's frame and therefore reduces the amount of drawing space by twice its amount.

Specified by:
getYBuffer in interface GraphRedrawListener
Overrides:
getYBuffer in class TechnicalTestAbstract.GraphPanelAbstract
Returns:
The number of pixels to use at the top and bottom of the graph.

getMaxValue

Returns:
The data's maximum value.

Returns:
The data's minimum value.

getTickSize

public double getTickSize()
Gets the size of a tick for the commodity being drawn. This keeps the scale of the graph in multiples of this tick size.

Specified by:
getTickSize in interface GraphRedrawListener
Overrides:
getTickSize in class TechnicalTestAbstract.GraphPanelAbstract
Returns:
The data's tick size.

redrawTitle

public boolean redrawTitle(Graphics g,
                           int yOffset)
Draws the title of the graph at the top of the graph offset by the other graph titles that are alread there.

Specified by:

Overrides:
redrawTitle in class TechnicalTestAbstract.GraphPanelAbstract
Returns:
always returns true

drawGraph

public void drawGraph(Graphics g,
                      StatsAbstract stats,
                      CommodityCalendar calendar,
                      int xAxisLeft,
                      int xAxisRight,
                      int yAxisBottom,
                      double minValue,
                      int xScale,
                      double yScale)
Draw the graph itself.

Overrides:
drawGraph in class TechnicalTestAbstract.ContinuousLineGraphPanelAbstract
Parameters:
g - the graphics area to draw in
stats - the statistics to be drawn
calendar - the calendar to be used to process the graph starting on a monday
xAxisLeft - the position of the left side of the graph
xAxisRight - the position of the right side of the graph
yAxisBottom - the position of the bottom side of the graph
minValue - the minimum value to be graphed
xScale - the horizontal scale the graph is to be drawn in
yScale - the vertical scale the graph is to be drawn in
